item.title: By: xxextensioncord69420
item.dc:creator: xxextensioncord69420
item.description: And generally amazing. I got hit with one hell of an emotional wave, I might just go binge-play the whole game again…
item.content:encoded: And generally amazing. I got hit with one hell of an emotional wave, I might just go binge-play the whole game again…

item.title: By: yogurtdotcom
item.dc:creator: yogurtdotcom
item.description: Too bad the story was crap imo
item.content:encoded: Too bad the story was crap imo

item.title: By: lbeck22
item.dc:creator: lbeck22
item.description: There were so many parts in the game where I jsut had to stop and admire how beautiful it is. The only other game so far that I’ve experienced that on is Ghost of Tsushima
item.content:encoded: There were so many parts in the game where I jsut had to stop and admire how beautiful it is. The only other game so far that I’ve experienced that on is Ghost of Tsushima

item.title: By: Stuntm4nMik3
item.dc:creator: Stuntm4nMik3
item.description: It’s a wonderful game to play. Graphically and storyline. Gets far too much unjust hate.
item.content:encoded: It’s a wonderful game to play. Graphically and storyline. Gets far too much unjust hate.
